properties.name: Romni Wool
properties.description: Posted by Mairi 658 Queen Street West Toronto, ON M6J 1E5The store is located in downtown Toronto, in the heart of the Queen West Village. Romni has over 6000 square feet of yarns and fibers from around the globe. We also carry spinning wheels and weaving equipment. Wander through our vast selection of yarns on the main floor, as well as our huge selection of sale items, cone yarns, fibers, and spinning supplies on the lower level. Monday -- 10am to 6pm Tuesday -- 10am to 6pm Wednesday -- 10am to 6pm Thursday -- 10am to 8pm *open late Friday -- 10am to 6pm Saturday -- 10am to 6pm Sunday -- CLOSED

properties.name: Yarn Forward
properties.description: Posted by Mairi 474 Hazeldean Road, Kanata, ON K2L 4E5Our store hours are: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday - 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. Thursday - 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. Saturday - 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Sunday - Noon to 5 p.m. Every Thursday afternoon we have a Sit \'N Knit. Just come along to the store, bring your current project, sit around our table and chat, swap ideas, and have a good time. We provide the coffee, tea and cookies, and help if you need it. There is no charge, and no purchase is necessary.
